override-signature-hold-by-id.help: Enable/disable override of hold of triggering signatures that are specified by IDs regardless of hold.
override-signature-hold-by-id.name: override-signature-hold-by-id

options.help: Allow the signatures specified by IDs to be triggered even if they are on hold.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not trigger the signatures that are on hold.
options.name: disable

signature-hold-time.help: Time to hold and monitor IPS signatures. Format <#d##h> (day range: 0 - 7, hour range: 0 - 23, max hold time: 7d0h, default hold time: 0d0h).
signature-hold-time.name: signature-hold-time
